Text: Seed! For the love of Jebus!

About the system requirements, which I forgot to mention: they're nothing to worry about, but you do need a graphics card with at least Shader Model 3.0. Just a heads up for people with really old PCs.

Also there's some known game issues mentioned in the readme file, be sure to check those out.
Was patiently waiting for this to hit TPD.  Thank you very much!
So was I. I got sick of waiting so I asked for it on the forum yesterday and esharoth kindly responded and uploaded it. Thanks again.
cannot install on win 7 64x the installation is stucked for hours /:

I've tested the installer on Windows 7 x64 for over a dozen times. It would be great if you could tell me your system specs, if you have UAC enabled, and if you tried installing the game from a normal or administrator account.

In the meantime, you can extract setup.bin with 7-zip.
nice game. thanks.
Thank you so much.

Downloaded fine with Win 7/64. BUT, the first time around Norton zapped it, so I had to exclude the file and then download again. If you're getting hung up, perhaps your anti-virus software is interfering with the installation. It's happened to me before and it wasn't immediately clear to me that Norton was responsible. Just a thought.

Thanks for the up, esharoth.

That's good advice. And if you're worried about running the executable, upload it to VirusTotal and you'll see that it's clean:

www.virustotal.com/file/2a6003ef2abfec105166b3a5fc754a8e97fba4e6cc20a2e39c209137d0427d61/analysis/

Thanks for it.

Hey, TPB. Need your help. Got the game working, but for some reason, I can't increase the resolution above 600x400. This normally wouldn't be a problem, but the the dialogue text doesn't exactly scale with the size. It's cut. This is weird. http://i.imgur.com/NHrYXgo.png

How many acts is there so far?

Hey esharoth!
You said there is no virus but virustotal.com says it has a trojan!
TrendMicro-HouseCall - TROJ_GEN

Look at the date when I posted that: 2013-01-25. Now look at the date of the last analysis on VirusTotal: 2013-04-16. 

So now, in April, one scanner out of 46 used on VirusTotal detects a trojan. And it's Trend Micro's free product HouseCall, but their premium TrendMicro didn't detect anything.

I will go ahead and say that it's a false positive. If you don't agree with that, don't download this torrent. Support the developers by buying the game.

The Mac version esharoth linked to appears to contain a Windows .exe file; it's not clear how it's supposed to run on a Mac. 

(esharoth, thanks for posting these games - I asked this question on the Mac torrent's page, but I am repeating my question here because the thread is more active and I thought you'd be more likely to see it.)
I have replied to you on the page for the MAC version of the game, it doesn't come with an exe file.
